notesStmt.note: Text and signatures in the same hand; copied with a dull reed, possibly a draft; Solomon ben Jeshuah declares that he has sold the content of his store, which includes wood and other goods. The witnesses signed are Joseph ben Maimon and Nissim and the name of the buyer is in the missing part of the page.
Condition: losses in center; verso, save unrelated scribblings, is blank.
